original: You surrender and submit yourself to the mercy of [From.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] may or may not spare your life...\n
translation: 你放下武器投降，祈求[From.GetTitledName]的怜悯。[From.GetSheHeCap]也许会，也有可能不会饶过你……\n

original: Our §Y$GOVERNMENT$§! government allows us to retract vassals without objections from other vassals.
translation: 我们的§Y$GOVERNMENT$§!政体允许我们收回封臣而不引起其他封臣的反对。

original: Rulers can order adult unlanded courtiers to take the vows
translation: 统治者可以要求成年无地廷臣发誓

original: Playing as a Patrician within a Merchant Republic is not entirely dissimilar from playing a Feudal lord - you are still after more Holdings, and you need an heir of your family. However, leadership of the Republic changes between the five major Patrician families through special elections. Patricians can also build a network of Trade Posts, even in the counties of other powers...
translation: 作为一个共和国贵人和封建领主其实也没什么大区别——你还是要控制更多的领地，并且需要一位你家族的继承人。不过，共和国的领导位置将会在五个主要贵人家族里通过特殊选举轮流替换。贵人们还可以修建贸易站网络，即使是在其他势力的省份上……

original: Can build $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings
translation: 可以建造$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Cannot build Holdings
translation: 不可以建造地产

original: Cannot imprison subjects without special reasons
translation: 如果没有特殊原因，不可囚禁臣属

original: Vassal titles can be revoked without needing any special laws
translation: 封臣头衔可以被剥夺，无需特定的法律

original: Cannot revoke titles without special reasons
translation: 如果没有特殊原因，不能剥夺头衔

original: Can hold $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings without penalties
translation: 可以无惩罚持有$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Can hold $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings without penalties for counties with your culture
translation: 可以在同文化省份内无惩罚持有$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Can hold $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings without penalties for counties with your religion
translation: 可以在同宗教省份内无惩罚持有$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Can hold $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings without penalties for counties with your culture and religion
translation: 可以在同文化及宗教省份内无惩罚持有$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Have $NUM$ additional Commanders
translation: 有$NUM$名额外指挥官

original: Have $NUM$ fewer Commanders
translation: $NUM$个指挥官

original: Can move capital within the same lifetime every $NUM$ months
translation: 在一生中每隔$NUM$个月可以移动一次首都

original: Can revoke titles from $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals without objections from other vassals.
translation: 可以剥夺$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对。

original: Can revoke titles from $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals of another culture without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体下不同文化的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals of another religion without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体下不同宗教的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals of another culture and religion without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体下不同文化和宗教的封臣的头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $TIER_LIST$ tier vassals without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以收回$TIER_LIST$等级的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $TIER_LIST$ tier vassals of another culture without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$TIER_LIST$等级下不同文化的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $TIER_LIST$ tier vassals of another religion without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$TIER_LIST$等级下不同宗教的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can revoke titles from $TIER_LIST$ tier vassals of another culture and religion without objections from other vassals
translation: 可以剥夺$TIER_LIST$等级下不同文化和宗教的封臣头衔而不引起其他封臣的反对

original: Can call $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals to arms instead of using liege levies
translation: 可以召唤$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体的封臣参战而不是用他们提供的征召兵

original: Do not get vassal tax from $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals
translation: 不从$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体的封臣那里获得税收

original: $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals will give max taxes and max liege levies regardless of opinion. Tyranny actions against these vassals can be made without objections from vassals of other governments
translation: 属于$GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体的封臣们不论好感的多少都会交最多的税和提供最多的征召兵。对待这些封臣们的暴君行为不会受到其他政体的封臣们反对

original: $GOVERNMENT_LIST$ government vassals are not included in vassal limit calculation
translation: $GOVERNMENT_LIST$政体的封臣不在封臣上限的计算之内

original: Landless
translation: 无地的

original: Uses Prestige to build $HOLDINGS_LIST$ Holdings
translation: 用威望来建造$HOLDINGS_LIST$地产

original: Forts can be built in all counties you control, and in hostile counties where you have troops present. Forts cost §Y$COST$§! to construct and can be upgraded to regular Castle Holdings (by §GRight-Clicking the Fort§!). Forts lock down your occupation of empty nomad provinces and negate the crushing Attrition enjoyed by certain Pagan tribes in their homelands.
translation: 堡垒可以在你控制的任何一个省份建造，也可以在你当前军队驻扎的敌对省份建造。建造堡垒将花费§Y$COST$§!，并且可以被升级为正常的城堡地产（通过§G右键点击堡垒§!）。堡垒可以帮助锁定你占领的游牧空地，还能使你在一些原始宗教家园不再受到巨量损耗惩罚。

original: Tribal 'Holdings' provide very little income, and there can only be one Tribal 'Holding' in each county. These 'Holdings' represent the entire local tribal population - the more empty Holding slots, the more powerful the Tribal Holding.
translation: 部落「地产」只提供极少的收入，而且每个省份只能有一个部落「地产」。这些「地产」代表整个当地部落人口——地产空闲格数越多，部落地产就越强。

original: The Holdings in §Y$TITLE$§! are all, de jure, vassals of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!里的地产在法理上都属于§Y$CLAIMANT$§!，这给了我们发动战争的充足理由。

original: [Title.GetBaseName] Holdings
translation: [Title.GetBaseName]地产

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ De Jure Holding War over $OTHER_TITLE$
translation: $ORDER$ $FIRST_ADJ$—$SECOND_ADJ$争夺$OTHER_TITLE$法理领地战争

original: Adopt Feudalism
translation: 采用封建制

original: Adopting Feudalism will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Castles. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.
translation: 采用封建制将把我所有的部落地产转变为城堡。如果这块省份足够大，而且城市与神殿地产并未存在，也会生成城市与神庙。如果你的封臣与你同宗教与文化，他们也很可能如法炮制。

original: Adopt Feudalism
translation: 采用封建制

original: Adopting Feudalism will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Castles. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Your vassals are likely to follow suit if they are of your religion and culture.
translation: 采用封建制将把我所有的部落地产转变为城堡。如果这块省份足够大，而且城市与神庙地产并未存在，也会生成城市与神殿。如果你的封臣与你同宗教与文化，他们也很可能如法炮制。

original: Found Merchant Republic
translation: 成立商业共和国

original: Founding a Merchant Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist. Four suitable vassals will found Patrician families.
translation: 成立商业共和国会使得我的所有部落地产转变为城市。如果这块省份足够大且无城堡与神殿地产，也会生成城堡与神殿。四位合适的封臣将会建立贵人家族。

original: Your Tribal vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has adopted Feudalism.
translation: 你的部落封臣，[From.GetTitledName]已经采用封建制。

original: I can upgrade [Root.GetFullName] to a proper Castle. If it is the County capital and the County is big enough, City and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.
translation: 我可以把[Root.GetFullName]晋升为一座真正的城堡。如果该城堡是省份首府，同时该省份足够大，且无城市与神殿地产，也会生成城市与神殿。

original: I can upgrade [Root.GetFullName] to a proper City. If it is the County capital and the County is big enough, Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.
translation: 我可以把[Root.GetFullName]晋升为一座真正的城市。如果该城市是省份首府，同时该省份足够大，且无城堡与神殿地产，也会生成城堡与神殿。

original: Occupied Land Modifiers
translation: 占领土地修正

original: Population Growth(total)
translation: 人口增长（总）

original: Upon construction of a new holding the §YFort§! in this county will be removed and contribute to a discount on the construction cost.
translation: 由于建造了一个新地产，这个省份的§Y要塞§!会被移除，作为补偿，建造成本会减少。

original: Doesn't border a Lake
translation: 不毗邻湖泊。

original: Borders a Lake
translation: 毗邻湖泊。
